website_summaries.verdict: If your child is looking for a fun way to zoom their Littlest Pet Shop pets to their next destination, the shuttle is a great toy.
pros: Comes with a pet, 4 accessories, an emoji bubble, 16 Deco Bits, 2 paper banners, and a sticker sheet
Can hold 5 Classic pets plus 5 Teenie pets
Seating on both the top and bottom levels
cons: Some of the pieces that attach to the shuttle fall off easily

customer_reviews.title: The tiny embellishments stay fine but the rails
customer_reviews.text: This toy is cute. My daughter loves it. You can fit a lot of LPS's in there and the price was fair. The only issues are with the attachments. The tiny embellishments stay fine but the rails, slide and side view mirrors do not stay on. The holes you are supposed to put them in are too shallow so they don't stay. The same is for the slit for the slide to stick in. It doesn't really work.
customer_reviews.author: NC PotterFan

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This toy is seriously a piece of crap. None of the little pieces will stay on like the slide or the side rails you have to use glue to keep them on or they just fall right off. I am really disappointed. I bought it for my daughter for her birthday and she absolutely loves it but I'm very disappointed that it so cheaply made. I'm gonna try to fix it with glue today. Luckily she loves it regardless but I feel bad that I gave her a toy that is such a piece of crap And she was so excited to get it because she loves the littlest pet shop toys.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Matthis

customer_reviews.title: ... 4 year old and her 6 year old girlfriends love this and play with it all the time
customer_reviews.text: my 4 year old and her 6 year old girlfriends love this and play with it all the time. It's okay quality. The slide, top rail, megaphone & globe all come off which drives me crazy because I like everything assembled, but the kids like taking them apart so no big deal. It's better they take it apart and play with it then it sit in a toy box. Overall happy with the product and feel it was a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Daughter Loves It
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on sale as a gift for my 7-year-old, and she loves it. Honestly, I just see it as a piece of junk, but she’s had hours of fun with it. She’s also obsessed with Legos, so the Lego people often go for rides on this bus too. I’d say this is a winner.
customer_reviews.author: JC Lach

customer_reviews.title: cute bus
customer_reviews.text: The bus is really cute however some of the pieces do not really stay in place well. The slide at the back fits in place well but with a slight touch it falls off the same goes for the side mirrors they are very hard to get to stay in place. Overall though the bus is a nice toy because you do not really need more than the body of the bus to have fun with it. It holds about 4 larger pets and 4 smaller ones. The wheels are real wheels so the bus rolls really well.
customer_reviews.author: drm

customer_reviews.title: Cuter in person and almost a craft project at first
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old had so much fun putting all the little pieces on this part bus. It's definitely not for children who put things in their mouth or if you have younger siblings who might. The pieces don't completely stay on all the time and can pose a risk with younger siblings but if you don't need to worry about that then defiantly pick this up for your child!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Sarah E

customer_reviews.title: Overall happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Overall happy with this product. My daughter loves it. Some of the tiny pieces are hard to get wedged into the right spot. And the little paper streamers didn’t stay attached.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Adorable vehicle for LPS toys! 10 year old and her friends all love it and play with it a lot. Would definitely recommend for any LPS fans.
customer_reviews.author: Kacie Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great for LPS lovers
customer_reviews.text: This is very cute and just what I was hoping for. My 6 year old is a huge LPS lover and she loves this. The shuttle is cute and offers a lot of room for the pet shop characters and comes with stickers to decorate the shuttle. The driver character that comes with is very cute also.

customer_reviews.title: Large enough to hold many cats and dogs.
customer_reviews.text: The girls are very entertained by the shuttle and it gives them plenty of room for hauling their many little friends around. They love this shuttle. Structured well and is colorful.

product_meta.title: Littlest Pet Shop LPS Shuttle
product_meta.description: Take the pets on a tour through Downtown City in their very own double-decker shuttle bus! A disco ball and star-shaped banners create a real party atmosphere, and the emoji bubble lets everyone know what a fun time the pets are having – right through the megaphone on the roof! Decorate the shuttle with Deco Bits pieces and stickers for a custom look. Shuttle comes with pet (Barkley Woofley #92) with hat accessory – looks like he's the official driver of this fun-filled vehicle. Featuring fun bobble-head motion, he makes a great addition to any pet collection. And girls can bring their pets to life in the LPS Your World app*. Once the app is launched, simply hold the pet and scan the code to unlock it in the game! Play activities, decorate, and design a cool Littlest Pet Shop world digitally! *Available at least through December 31, 2017. Not compatible with prior apps, earlier LPS pets, or current LPS smaller pets. Littlest Pet Shop Your World app works with select iPhone, iPad, iPod touch, and select Android devices. Updates may affect compatibility. Check littlestpetshop.com for availability, compatibility, and instructions. In-app purchases available. Not available in all languages or markets. Littlest Pet Shop and all related characters are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: Made in the USA and Imported
Includes shuttle, pet, 4 accessories, emoji bubble, 16 Deco Bits pieces, 2 paper banners, and sticker sheet.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars345 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
